name: Invasion.exe
description:
Play in fullscreen for the best perfomance and make sure to zoom out a bit on the browser!

Created for Indie Tales Jam 2021

Simple controls, use the mouse to move around      Move around in one room and avoid the code blocks!  Discover the ominous small cursor game  Try to get 0 attempts on the game! I am aware of a bug where the mouse stops moving past a certain point, this has to do with the unity cursor being weird. tap fullscreen before the start finishes loading
